feed.title: mlibby.com
feed.subtitle: I am Michael C. Libby and this is my web site. I am a software developer.

entry.title: In Progress: Switching to Jekyll
entry.content:
I've finally gotten around to putting this site on Jekyll. Well, almost.

It's a work in progress. I am dumping the Bootstrap framework for styling and layout, so I do need to update some styles and layouts around the site. And not all of the old pages have been converted yet.

This is a sample code snippet I'm trying to style: 

def foo
  puts "bar"
end
entry.summary: I've finally gotten around to putting this site on Jekyll. Well, almost. It's a work in progress. I am dumping the Bootstrap framework for styling and layout, so I do need to update some styles and layouts around the site. And not all of the old pages have been converted yet.
